pageContext.claim: “He died after running into a dead-end tunnel, whimpering and crying and screaming all the way. The compound had been cleared by this time, with people either surrendering or being shot and killed.”
pageContext.analysis: The secretary of defense, the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staffs as well as the regional commander who oversaw the operation that killed Baghdadi were not able to confirm the deceased leader was “whimpering and crying and screaming,” as Trump said. All three saw the same feed of the raid that the president viewed. No additional evidence has been released to support Trump's version of events.
